price: Ubwo yabwiraga se n’abantu be ati “Ibi mugaragira ni ibiki?”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mādhā taʿbudūna
